name: New! Jive Time Logo Slipmats
description: We feature these slipmats on our listening stations at Jive Time. Do to requests by our friends and customers we now offer them for sale! Our logo is hand-screened in "Turntable Gray" on a soft, medium-weight black felt slipmat. Your turntable and records will thank you! Shipping: Slipmats are usually in stock and will ship within a few days but please allow 7 to 14 days within the U.S. for the occasion that we are out of stock and we’ll have one printed to order. For orders outside the U.S. please contact us directly. Combine shipping! No additional shipping charge if purchased with any other item.

name: Dark Gray Logo Tee
description: Our classic logo gets a subtle 3D treatment. This is a lightweight, 100% cotton "Deep Heather Gray" T-shirt, hand-screened with a black, water-based, eco-friendly ink for a very soft, vintage effect. Our Canvas/Bella brand tees are made from 100% combed ringspun cotton (heather tees are 90% cotton and 10% polyester) and are super soft with a modern, slightly fitted shape. Our Unisex tees run slightly big; If you're in-between sizes and like a fitted look, we suggest rounding down. Small: 28-30 (sizes) / 34"-37" (chest) Med: 32-34 (sizes) / 38"-41" (chest) Large: 36-38 (sizes) / 42"-45" (chest) XL: 40-42 (sizes) / 46"-49" (chest) Check Canvas's shirt specs for an exact fit. Shipping: Many items are in stock and will ship within a few days but please allow 7 to 14 days within the U.S. for sizes and/or colors that may be out of stock and we’ll have one silk-screened to order. If you need an item quickly, please contact us us so we can send you a more accurate ETA. For orders outside the U.S. please contact us directly. Combine shipping. No additional shipping charge if purchased with any other item!

name: U.F.R. Tee
description: Unidentified Flying Records spotted hovering over Seattle’s Fremont Neighborhood. Vinyl collections across the Northwest proliferate as a result of this strange phenomenon. This special, limited edition T-shirt was designed especially for our 12th Anniversary and features Martian Green and White graphics hand-screened on a 100% cotton Midnight Blue tee. (This design also available in a Women’s Cut.) Our Canvas/Bella brand tees are made from 100% combed ringspun cotton and are super soft with a modern, slightly fitted shape. Our Unisex tees run slightly big; If you're in-between sizes and like a fitted look, we suggest rounding down. name: Space Needle Tonearm Tee
description: As the city boasting the country's largest needle, it's no wonder Seattle has so many great record stores! Here we've combined our beloved Space Needle with our even more beloved analog format. (This design also available in a Women’s Cut.) This is a lightweight, "Heather Gray", cotton T-shirt, hand-screened with a black, water-based, eco-friendly ink for a very soft, vintage effect. Our Canvas/Bella brand tees are made from 100% combed ringspun cotton and are super soft with a modern, slightly fitted shape. name: Canvas Record Tote Bag
description: Papa’s got a brand new bag! Our lightweight, durable cotton canvas LP tote comfortably holds 1-15 LPs (or several books) and features our popular Space Needle Tone Arm design hand-screened on both sides in a dark brown on natural canvas. Shipping: Many items are in stock and will ship within a few days but please allow 7 to 14 days within the U.S. for sizes and/or colors that may be out of stock and we’ll have one silk-screened to order. If you need an item quickly, please contact us us so we can send you a more accurate ETA. For orders outside the U.S. please contact us directly. Combine shipping. No additional shipping charge if purchased with any other item! More Jive Time tote designs available on our Etsy Shop!

name: Jive Time Logo</br>Women’s Cut Tees
description: Five of our most popular Unisex Tees are now available in a women’s cut! Choose from Classic Black with our pink and orange logo, Teal or Raspberry with a black logo, Heather Gray with our Space Needle Tone-Arm design, or Navy Blue with a three color Flying Saucer design! Our Bella brand womens tees are made from 100% combed ringspun cotton (heather tees are 90% cotton and 10% polyester) and are lightweight and super soft for a modern fit and feel. For exact sizes, view Bella's Woman’s T-Shirt Specs. Shipping: Many items are in stock and will ship within a few days but please allow 7 to 14 days within the U.S. for sizes and/or colors that may be out of stock and we’ll have one silk-screened to order. If you need an item quickly, please contact us us so we can send you a more accurate ETA. For orders outside the U.S. please contact us directly. Combine shipping. No additional shipping charge if purchased with any other item!

name: Jive Time Gift Certificate
description: Win the hearts of your favorite vinyl junkie with a Jive Time gift certificate! When checking out, please use the “Notes” field to let us know how to fill out the “To” and “From” and if you would like the certificate mailed to you (default) or directly to the recipient. You could also request that the certificate be left at Jive Time to be picked up in-person by the recipient. You can also call Jive Time directly to purchase and arrange delivery at (206) 632-5483. Shipping: Free shipping on all Gift Certificates! Gift certificates ship out within 1-3 business days. Please allow 5-7 days for delivery in the U.S. If you need a certificate sooner please contact us and we’ll do our best to accommodate your schedule.

name: Jive Time Gold Gift Certificate
description: Win the hearts of your favorite vinyl junkie with a Jive Time gift certificate! When checking out, please use the “Notes” field to let us know how to fill out the “To” and “From” and whether you would like the certificate mailed to you (default) or directly to the recipient. name: Jive Time Platinum</br>Gift Pack
description: Win the hearts of your favorite vinyl junkie with a Jive Time Records gift certificate! Purchase this $100 certificate and we'll even sweeten the deal by throwing in a free Jive Time T-shirt or canvas LP tote bag! Unless specified otherwise we'll leave the "to" and "from" blank and mail the certificate directly to you. (Please use PayPal’s “Notes to Seller” field if you would like us to fill in the “to” and “from” and/or mail the certificate directly to the recipient. You can also request that the certificate be left at Jive Time to be picked up in-person by the recipient.) Use the "Notes to Seller" field at PayPal upon check out to specify whether you would like us to include a free canvas tote bag or T-shirt (indicate size and color of shirt). You can also call Jive Time directly to purchase and/or arrange delivery at (206) 632-5483. Shipping: Free shipping on all Gift Certificates! Gift certificates ship out within 1-3 business days. Please allow 5-7 days for delivery in the U.S. If you need a certificate sooner please contact us and we’ll do our best to accommodate your schedule.

name: Project Thirty-Three T-Shirt
description: This design was inspired by the circles and dots so prevalent on the album covers on our popular blog, Project Thirty-Three. The site showcases our large collection of mid-century record sleeves designed using only simple shapes and typography. New! Now available in Classic White, Cream, Red, and Asphalt Gray, and both Unisex and Women's cuts. These lightweight cotton T-shirts are hand-screened using a black, water-based, eco-friendly ink for a very soft, vintage effect. Our Canvas/Bella brand tees are made from 100% combed ringspun cotton and are super soft with a modern, slightly fitted shape. Our Unisex tees run slightly big; If you're in-between sizes and like a fitted look, we suggest rounding down. Check Canvas's Men’s/Unisex Shirt Specs and Bella’s Woman’s Shirt Specs for an exact fit. Shipping: Many items are in stock and will ship within a few days but please allow 7 to 14 days within the U.S. for sizes and/or colors that may be out of stock and we’ll have one silk-screened to order. If you need an item quickly, please contact us us so we can send you a more accurate ETA. For orders outside the U.S. please contact us directly. Combine shipping. No additional shipping charge if purchased with any other item!
